caption.center: PLINY FISK et al., Copartners under the Firm Name of HARVEY FISK SONS,
Respondents, v. JAMES G. BATTERSON, Appellant.

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
William J. Moran for appellant.
G. Sumner, Thomas D. Thacher and Leland B. Duer for respondents.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed and judgment absolute ordered against appellant on the stipulation, with costs in all courts; no opinion.
Concur: HISCOCK, Ch. J., COLLIN, CUDDEBACK, CARDOZO, POUND, CRANE and ANDREWS, JJ.
